Comment 2 by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
When you build a program, then you want that it can be used by the users without any
problem. And say it to the users that they've to turn off the firewall is not the best
solution.

Neither say them that allow all local conections because the most of people have not
enough knowledge about it. They see a window with a message of alert in red, and most of
them simply pressing the cancel button or they block the connection.
